description:
Description As a VP of Business Development, you will focus on prospecting and closing B2B clients, more specifically physician's offices. The VP of Business Development will be assigned physician's office prospects. Sales efforts will focus on cold-calling, webinars, trade shows, relationship selling, and similar outbound sales efforts. This role will be activity driven - focusing on outreach and touchpoints. This position reports to the Director of Sales.
Responsibilities:
Prioritizing, calling, meeting, proposing, and closing new deals with physician's offices to achieve monthly sales objectives Maintaining Salesforce automation system to track and optimize activities Prioritizing, calling, meeting, proposing, and closing new physician's office business Attending trade shows, conducting webinars, and other thought leadership activities Studying market developments and company metrics to identify new segments and adapt sales strategy and techniques Requirements Basic
Qualifications:
Experience selling to physicians and their office staff A high degree of persistence, self-confidence, and comfort with cold calling Outgoing, energetic, and personable High impact communication and presentation skills Highly organized with the ability to prioritize and focus on key opportunities Capable of building trusting relationships Execution of proposals, meetings, diligent follow-up, and deal closing Preferred
Qualifications:
Existing network in the healthcare industry, physician's offices preferred Understanding of complex financial products and the ability to simplify into a coherent story Experience in Software as a Service (SAAS) is a plus Benefits Why You'll Love It Here Incredible growth potential 100% employer-paid medical and dental premiums for full-time employees 18 days of PTO (& 10 Paid Holidays) 401k retirement plan -- with a 6% non-elective contribution, so you get the money no matter what Transaction bonus unit plan - you have a stake in the success of Paymerang Maternity and Paternity Leave:
because both moms and dads are parents Plus, daily catered breakfast and snacks to keep you fueled up throughout the day.
Salary Range:
$100K -- $150K
Minimum Qualification
Business DevelopmentEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
